articles.description: Production of the popular top-spec Z8L variant was prioritised by the firm since the SUV’s launch     Scorpio N is available in Z2, Z4, Z6, Z8, and Z8L trims.     Mass-production of the Z2 and Z4 trims will start by month-end, thus reducing their waiting peri…
articles.content:
• Scorpio N is available in Z2, Z4, Z6, Z8, and Z8L trims.

articles.author: Pallavi Nahata
articles.title: Labour-Intensive Exports Hit Hard In Broad-Based Decline - BQ Prime
articles.description: Exports continue to ease, with labour-intensive exports seeing a sharper decline.
articles.content: In value terms, the sequential decline in imports was predominantly on account of petroleum products, transport equipment, gems and jewellery, chemicals, and ores and minerals. Cumulatively, they wer… [+1259 chars]

articles.title: Hot Stocks: Brokerages view on ONGC, Vodafone Idea, Nestle, KFin - Economic Times
